doc:
Paul Kersey (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Kersey_(actor) 0 Paul Kersey (born February 10, 1970) is an American actor. He starred opposite Ning Jing in the Feng Xiaoning films Red River Valley (1997) and Lover's Grief over the Yellow River (1999). Kersey also portrayed the younger version of David Banner in Hulk (2003). On television, he played the son of James Coburn's character in Missing Pieces (2000). Paul_Kersey ( born February_10_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor . He starred opposite_Ning_Jing in the_Feng_Xiaoning_films_Red_River_Valley_(_1997_) and Lover 's_Grief over the_Yellow_River_(_1999_) . Kersey also portrayed the_younger_version of David_Banner in Hulk_(_2003_) . On television , he played the_son of James_Coburn 's_character in Missing Pieces_(_2000_) .
